values:
So this is love?
Love is murderous.
Die young and save yourself.
Its all a whim.
A roll of the dice.
A fork in the road.
Put forth your all.
How shall it end?
Oh the posibilities.
Yet always such the ghost.

Still we give our hearts.
For the chance to love.
Try and fail and die. 
Live and breath and soar.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/17066.html

Glitter left behind
Envy now consumes me
Jealosy fills my head
As you sit there and sparkle

Oh to be so lucky
You there stuck in the middle
Stealer of kisses
Reciever of sympathy

Your reign is ending soon
Once again no better than me
Fuel my fire
Enjoy it while you can

Upper hand is mine
Ill then be the thief
What you want, not what you need
My lips wish to sparkle...
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/16832.html

Dig into myself again
Should have never let you in
Should have kept things bottled up inside
They were all my things to hide

I sure do hope you miss me now
If you need help Ill show you how
Sit all day and think of me
And just how good things used to be

Wait and wait for my embrace
But only your miskates thrown in your face
Cry your eyes red just like I did
My pity goes to the highest bid

I am not sad, upset, or even down
Never again will you see me frown
Now all these fellings have already set
Forever I hope that you live with regret
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/16393.html

Today was one of those days that sucked, but yet it didnt suck.
Let me try and explain.

Worked sucked today.  We are always there late on Mondays, but of course, the belt threw an ungodly amount of rods forcing us to have to stay even later due to the setback. But this morning I got to see Wendy and take her to work.  Even though I didnt see her for long, it was good just to see her.  I was in a good mood, so having the problem at work and having to stay late didnt bother me...like it normally does.  

Did that make any sense?  I think it did...

Moving along...
Late nights, snuggling, xbox...those were the glory days!  :)
Maybe again soon... 

Well, I suppose its time to try and go to bed so I can wake up that sexy creature Wendy in the morning.

Till next time...
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/16284.html

Excuse me miss.
Sorry for interrupting,
and im not trying to make a pass.
But you have to be leaving the country,
If you are packing that much ass.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/16051.html

Pale angel go away
Come again some other day
The devil has my ear today
I'll never hear of what you say
Promised I would find a little solace
And some piece of mind
Whatever just as long as I don't feel so

Desperate and Ravenous
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/15697.html

To and through the hollow
Constantly consuming
Conquer and devour
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/15613.html

"Some say a comet will fall from the sky. Followed by meteors showers and tidal waves. Followed by fault lines that cannot sit still. Followed by millions of dumbfounded dipshits, who some say the end is near.  Some say well see armaggedon soon.  Certainly hope we will. I sure could use a vacation from all this stupid shit. One great big festering neon distraction.  I have a suggestion to keep them all occupied. Learn to swim."

Aenima
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/15318.html

Struck by pain, chased by torment
Drowned in lament, buried by fear
Beneath the encasing ashes, 
Fresh air flows through my lungs
I look up with squinted eyes
The sun warming my cold skin

Standing reborn
My timid steps push me forward
Embracing the new light
Striving to pull fate onto my side

Trying to create this contagious smile
That I long to succeed in my ways
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/14938.html

I want to close my eyes
Keep this seamless vision warm
Happiness grazing the tips of my fingers
Uncertain that I can grasp it

I want to close my eyes
Keep this picture of beauty before me
Let myself go for a chance
Leave myself open for the taking

I want to close my eyes
Keep my faith in front of me
Have hope to bring me confort
The rush of subsiding pain
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/14654.html
Heaven always bleeds, but never shows.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/14484.html

How can a day go wrong when those 6 words are the first things you hear?  It cant, it hasnt, it wont.  

Ive uddered those words to to past loves because it was the way I felt, but I never knew how great they were until they were for once said to me.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/14200.html

Wow...  I havnt updated in quite some time.   
Guess its time to start...

Its been a quite good couple of weeks.  Ive been off work so its been fun not working and being able to hang out with my friends.
Ive really enjoyed spending the past 4 days with Wendy. Shes great.  Awsome personality, fun to be around... and very sexy!   :)

Im not looking forward to going back to work.  Oh well, it was bound to happen sooner or later.  I need to anyway...  but I have a feeling I might have to miss more work when i have the pins taken out of my finger.  Oh how nice it would be to miss the work, but I need to work.   Oh well! 

Thats all for now.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/14046.html

Today is the day of the surgery.  Just a few short hours.  Im not excited.  Mainly cuz of the IV and afterwards how i was told id feel like shit.

Here goes nothing...
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/13684.html

Before I begin, I have take in a good laugh at the comment about me wanting Mallori! Ha!  Why on Earth would I want to give up my peaceful, happy, more affordable life for her?  

Lets start off by first saying that you dont know anything about me.  You dont know me, and what you think you know about me is either A. Just complete bullshit. Or B. Truth streched so far that it is nothing that it originaly was.
What makes the whole situation even more sad for you and anyone else in her company, is that nobody knows Mallori.  She cant stay the same person for very long, and even if she did, her dishonesty would always shield the truth.  The eyes cant decieve the way the mouth does.  And thats all you have is words from the mouth.
You are defending a whim. How am I stupid?

Secondly, why do you read my entries?  Ultimately, they are no bussiness of yours.  And Mallori, you dont give two shits about me so what does what I say matter to you?  It shouldnt.  You should laugh...because its me speaking.  Pretending that things affect you annoys me.  Youd have to  care first, and im not stupid enough to believe that you do.

Last but not least, my entry is based on the principle of honesty.  I dont like being lied to...nobody does.  Though Mallori is dead to me in many ways, what we were allows me to care about her as a person, and excuse me for thinking that some of the things she does are downright moronic.  Its sad though that ive offered more help to her than most of her so called bestfriends.
Phrases such as "Everything will be alright" and "Ill take care of you" cant be wrote off as words of wisdom.

Keep those novel attempts at defense coming.
And Ill continue to laugh.
While you remain kept in the dark.

I think im going to have to do something about that pesky "Annonymous" post thing.  Since no one has the balls not to hide behind the annonymous posts, that should eliminate most nonsense. 
Accually, kudos to Mallori.  She accually does have the balls to make her self known.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/13504.html

You make me sick.
Pill popping, 
No good for nothing,
Dishonest Bitch Whore.

Enjoy your downfall.
I will.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/13229.html

Push and Shove.  Its all just a game.
Know...to not care. Care...to not know.
Play the game wrong. Dont incoroporate feeling.
Ill never know becuase you will never tell.
The wonders of wondering...
The sencrets in your eyes; the mystery on your lips.

To Kiss
To Find
To Know
To Care
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/13044.html

Standing on the ledge
You knew how fragile I was
So common to fall
Confiding in the beauty
Of the angelic winged sillouhette
Beneath my eyelids - You

Every blink the feathers drop
My eyes widen
To keep them from falling

Standing on the ledge
My foot slipping
My eyes slowy close 
never to open again
To aways gaze at your figure

Wind flowing over my body
Eyes still squeezed shut
I uncontrollably tear 
What remains of your tattered wings
Hands drenched in blood
Your figure in disarray
Tears streaming from my eyes

My fate sealed instantly by the cold ground.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/12564.html

So glad to see you well
Overcome and completely silent now
with Heavens Help
You cast your demons out
And not to pull your halo down
Around your neck and tug you off your cloud
But I'm more than just a little curious
How you're planning to go about
Making your amends to the dead
To the dead

Recall the deeds as if
They're all someone else's
Atrocious stories
Now you stand reborn before us all
So glad to see you well

And not to pull your halo down
Around your neck and tug you to the ground
But I'm more than just a little curious
How you're planning to go about
Making your amends to the dead
To the dead

With your halo slipping down
Your halo slipping

Your halo slipping down to choke you now
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/12298.html

I havn't posted in a while...and its been even longer since ive made a post thats was about my happenings.... so what the heck...here we go.

Things have been downright crazy.  Maule has been off work for the past couple of weekends which means the whole crew is off, which in turn means big parties!

Friday night i got off work pretty late.  So did adam.  But we still improvised like a mofo with the little beer left when we got home.  We both killed a bottle of wine we had in the fridge.  That did the trick!  

Saturday was crazy too.  Keg! It was a blast.  

Sunday was no different, except for us all going out late at night and trying to find the insane asylum off of pines road.  We found it...sort of.  We were in there, but the accual building is off into the woods from the winding roads through there.  It was so dark and we didnt have good flashlights so we could find it in the woods.  It was still fun running up in there.  And luckily there werent any "fireflys from hell" to make Maule and Breland haul-ass back to our cars.  I think saturday afternoon we need to make a trip out there when its light out, find the place and then come back at night so we can accually find it.

Adam is a roomate now...and thats cool.

Theres gonna be a lot more craziness.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/12249.html

I think sometimes...and its not intentional.
Have you ever had something so perfect it seams unreal?
Something so amazing that it takes your breath away?
Something so wonderful that you feel as if youd die without it?
Then lose it?
Then you cant help but compare that to everything else that happens in your life.
And it always appears that nothing can surpase what once was. 
Its never good enough...never amazing enough...never seams unreal.  
You know its real...but its just lacking.
You know that the perfection is gone...and its not going to come back.  
And deep down, you dont want THAT  particular perfection again...but just perfection again.
Being happy yet not as happy as you once were...
Then comes the comparison.  
Nothing can be as good as the first feeling.

I want to stop comparing.  
Stop wasting every second for nothing.

I guess ill continue comparing until something comes along and makes me forget about all past experiences.

Live.Love.Burn.Die
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/11857.html

I am not alone.
I am not complete.
I feel...the need.
Uncontrollable desire.

L - ong for happiness.
O - vercome emptiness.
V - alue life.
E - nd all pain.

Burning for the chance.
To trip and fall.
Swimming through my own adrenaline.
The rush from the sound of a voice.
It gives me chills...
Feeling whole...
Chills I wish not to warm.

http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/10944.html

I thought I heard you.
I ease my eyes open with anticipation.
But your not there.
Nothing but a cool spot beside me.
Where did you go?
Youve kept my dreams warm.
Swimming through my head.
I only know you in sleep. 
You dont exist.
But ill create you.
Then ill find you.
Then ill hold you.
How can I live?
Ill merely exist.
Basking in blissful hope.
I shall sleep.
Warmth will eventually wake me.

"I want to fight, I want to 
fight, I want to prove im right.  
So turn and forfeit."
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/10647.html

White cloth, black napkins
Wood chairs surround me
Wood tables, foggy sign
In front with no light

Night falls beneath candle light

Cast shadows
Insence fragrance
From the corner of the room
Cloudy senses Stale light below
Beneath me

Night falls beneath candle light
White squalls beneath winter skies
Night falls beneath winter skies
White squalls beneath winter skies

Faceless crowd of elderly beings
Roses sprouting yellow glow
Subconcious into the light

Night falls beneath candle light
White squalls beneath winter skies

Im ready for the weekend.  Shit with Mallori... shit with Stephanie and Jon.  I need a beer.  My head hurts and Im sleepy drunk like a bitch.  When I can think properly ill try this again.

Do you know how much I loved you?
Do you know how stupid I was for loving you?
Oh how much time I wasted with you in my thoughts.
You never deserved everything that I gave you.
Someone else more loving...more beautiful...more 
caring...more faithful. They did, not you.
Thats what get for trusting you.
But you know what?   And I wish you could see...
Theres a smile on my face.  Yes a smile.
Your reign of pain is over and I have been free. 
Youve lost and you dont even know who you are.  
Never again will anyone see who you really are.
But that is theyre problem.  Not mine.
Fresh air feel good flowing through my lungs.

An addicting taste.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/9649.html

Find me.
Dig me up and brush me off.
Numb from pain.
Make me feel again.

I know your there.
I dont know who you are.
Find me...Ill find you.
Well find each other. 

One day ill remember.
What that feels like.
One day Ill have.
The reason I breath.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/9360.html

One day I would like to sit back and say to myself: "I have everything that I could want."  What do I want?  
I want to have a good steady job.  I have that.  I want to buy a new car.  I have that.  I want to go to school.  I am in school.  I want to be on my own.  I am on my own.  I want to be in love again.  

That is the greatest feeling in the world.  I want it.
I want to feel complete again.  To love...and be loved.

Is that so much to ask?
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/9161.html

One thing can come and make you forget about everything youve tryed so hard to forget for so long.  One thing can make you more happy than you have ever been.  One thing can make you feel as though everything you need in life is complete.  One thing can make you know what Love truly is.     

I hope I find, can find, have found this Thing.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/8878.html

I fucked up my toe at work yesterday!  It hurts so bad.  I drop a steel pole straight down on it!  It doesnt feel good!  Hopefully I wont need to go to the emergency room...

This should be a good weekend all thing considered.  Shelly is going to be coming over and Saturday we are going to try going to Fatboys with Zach and them.  I dunno if I can wait 2 more days until I can be off my foot!  AHHHHH!
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/8570.html

Im so tired...tired of everything.
I hate stress.  Life is stressfull and sometimes I just hate life.  Just once Id love to be happy and have no worries.  Im sick of being sad.  Im just not going to be anymore...just ignore everything until it goes away or gets better somehow.  

Love is a fucked up thing.  Nothing else can make you both so happy and so depressed.  Ill never understand it.  Today I kissed Satan...and strangly, I liked it.  I like closing my eyes and drifting away with her.  ...I sometimes question whether I should though...   but I want to soar again...please take me away again.  I think Ive figured things out though:  Most everything that feels so right usually ends up being so wrong...somehow...  

Why? 

Life is just one huge riddle...
Maybe its just rhetorical...
Ah hell.  Fuck it.  It will always be a mystery.

Why fight it?
Just lie down and submit yourself to fate.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/8170.html

I can Love you more.
More than Him.
More than Them.
More than Anyone.

Can...Will...Always.

To You:

Its hard to sit back and not try.  I want to so badly to hold you and kiss you.  I miss you.  I feel so many odds againts me...  I dont know how to win.  I want to win.  Do you want me to win? Show me how to win.  Do you want to fall in Love with me?  Tell me...show me.

You are beautiful.
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/7830.html

Well, Im not staying as current wth my journal as Id like to...

Last week was a pretty good week.  Ive been car shopping, and finally after days of trying,  I got a new car.  Its a Lancer.  Its really nice.  

Thursday I spend a long morning with Mallori.  I had a really good time.  Im glad that I got to spend time with her.  I hope to continue to see her...ive missed them old times.  

The weekend is here and hopefully it will be a good one.  We are having a BBQ and hopefully Mal will come to see me today.  

Thats all for now...

"I want to love you...the way you need to be loved...the way you should be loved.  I want to take away your pain...It hurts me to see you cry.  I miss...everything.  I want to get closer, but you keep me slightly away from you.  I want to again think of nothing but you...    Nothing else exsists when I am with you.  I miss that...I miss you.

When I kiss you...my heart races...
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/7515.html

Well...its been a while since posted.  I finnaly got my computer set up in my new house.  Its great.  

Wednesday, Wal-Mart fucked up my car!  Simple oil change gone horribly fucked up!  Its alright though, they are paying for it...and my badass rental car!  Grand Am GT w/ Ram Air.  I think I am in love.  Too bad I will have to give it bad eventually... :(  

Me and Zach are going to a party tonight.  We were going to chill at his girls house, but shes being a bitch and doesnt want anyone over.  Hes gonna spend a little time with her...then...party time.  

Well...time to play some Halo.  

Untill later...

This weekend was not as productive as planned...  We needed a U-Haul, but almost everyone had to work all weekend so it was tough.  But they are going to take 2 day and move everything in this week.  This weekend everything should be totally livable!  I got my car insurance...great rate!   Everything is set...I am so stress free...  Ive never felt like that in a long time!  Well, I must go to work now.  There may be a lapse in entries while im getting everything set up in the new house.  

Till Later...

We got a house!!!  Me, my boys Maulle and Roussell, and Steph just signed the papers!  It is so awsome!  We are gonna be moving everything in this weekend!  I feel so much less stress right now...its so great.  Big 4 bedroom...its home now.  Unfortunately I have to go to work now...  

Till Later...
http://poisonedwell13.livejournal.com/6634.html

Tonight for you reading pleasure...a rant!
About...Disgustingly lazy fuckers!

Today just did me in...the world is full of extremely lazy people.  I can be lazy at times but my laziness is few and far between and to me, not unhealthy. But, some people just amaze me...and it makes me want to rip their arms off and beat them with thier own limbs.

I was at work...working as I should have been when along comes a fellow co-worker.  This particular person works in what we call "Area Z" and rides on an Easy-Go bringing items that cant go on the belt to us.  He approaches me and a buggy is slightly in the way.  He honks before getting near where I am.  I am not relatively close to him, and i find him rather annoying, so I ignore his presence.  Close to 5 minutes pass and he continues to sit, expecting me to move the buggy for him.  I continue to ignore him.  After those few minutes he steps off and gives the buggy a little kick, easily clearing his path...and off he goes.  

THIS KINDA SHIT PISSES ME OFF!  How hard is it to do something for yourself?  Obviously quite difficult indeed.  Im pretty sure the whole time he is thinking "Boy, I hope he comes and gets this buggy cuz I really dont wanna have to move it myself."  Worthless peices of shit! "Nothing says lemon like something from the tool shed."

I feel like shit right now...a little better than I have, but shit none the less.  I woke up with one of the worse headaches that I have had in a long time and it just wouldnt go away.  I gathered up enough strength to run to get some pain medicine a little while ago.  I got a Mt. Dew to take the pills with...   Bad choice...  I lost it and the pizza I had eaten earlier once I got home.  I am starting to feel better though.  

Steph has been moved to another hospital.  She sounds like she is doing a lot better.  I didnt get to see her this morning because they moved her before I could make it to the hostipal.  She should be out after 72 hours.  
I just really hope that this is a lesson well learned.

I think now would be a good idea to get my migrane pills refilled.  Those are some great pain killers...I could have felt like new by 3 o'clock.  I am now an Excedrin fan...best over-the-counter shit!  

In other news...

I am off work Tuesday.  I thought there was a concert with my favorite band that night, but they are playing in Baton Rouge...they changed it!  Grr!  That sux!  Well, me and Mallori are going to hang out Tuesday.  She is going to get a piercing.  Im looking forward to spending some time with her.  We havnt hung out in so long...  it may be my last chance to spend some time with her.  

Well, I am off to go see Steph.  

Until Later...
